exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros. split. - intros. apply in_map_iff in H. destruct H as [x [H1 H2]]. exists x. split. + apply in_flat_map. exists x. split. * apply H1. * apply H2. + apply H2. - intros. destruct H as [x [H1 H2]]. apply in_flat_map in H1. destruct H1 as [x' [H3 H4]]. apply in_map_iff. exists x'. split. + apply H3. + apply H4.
